name: Turbo Battle Tanks
description:
THIS IS THE ULTIMATE LOCAL CONFRONTATION GAME

(yeah really this is fun we promise).

What is the best way to spend a boring evening you say ? Of course, to destroy your friends ! Turbo Battle Tanks offers you the possibility to confront your friends on the same computer (2 player local, on the same keyboard).

Please note that this game is currently only with 2 players (not more not less, for the moment) and that there is no internet multiplayer.

Currently available features (there will be more soon) :

- 10 maps

- 1 game mode

What is planned for the future ?

- more maps on the way

- another theme for some other maps (surpriiiise)

- other game modes (Teaser : why only play with 1 friend ?)

Early Access :

THIS GAME IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT, so there will be a lot more content oncoming (you won't regret spending 1$, even if we know you are stingy), please check for updates sometimes.

Please leave Feedbacks !

This is our first comercialized game, so be kind and help us making it a true good experience (and huge loads of money).

Feel free to follow the Team on twitter to be notified whenever we post some stuffy stuff : https://twitter.com/TurboDevTeam
